about_the_game:
Story

One of the naturally occurring phenomena, "Dungeons."
These places, whimsically created by gods who govern heaven and earth, have captured the hearts of many.
People eventually become adventurers, and a culture of challenging various dungeons developed.

One day, two adventurers challenge a newly born dungeon.
They are the protagonist (senpai) and a junior adventurer named Nao.

It is a dangerous and unknown dungeon from which the research team has withdrawn, and the leader, the doctor, was taken away by monsters.
Along the way, Nao is attacked by a monster and falls into a special abnormal state.
To treat Nao, the protagonist picks up a paper dropped by the abducted doctor.

What kind of ending will this adventure have?

Game

Treat the heroine Nao, who is afflicted with various abnormal states, in erotic ways!
Nao loves her senpai from the beginning, so she will forgive him no matter what!
Use lovey-dovey treatments to conquer the dungeon!

Features

  • Pure love story
  • Card battles
  • A wide variety of H-scenes with abnormal states

About H-scenes

The main focus is on scenes combining pure love elements with abnormal states.
The heroine never engages in acts with anyone other than the protagonist.
There are 7 types of abnormal states:
  • Sleep
  • Paralysis
  • Confusion
  • Hypnosis
  • Succubus transformation
  • Lactation
  • Restraint

content_descriptors.notes: The game is filled with explicit mature content, including graphic sexual acts, non-consensual sex scenarios, BDSM, and other adult themes. It depicts various states that lead to explicit sexual interactions and detailed sexual dialogues. The characters in the game are over 18 years old.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: 7 / 8 / 8.1 / 10
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: ４ GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11/OpenGL 4.1 capable GPU
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 1 GB available space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: 11
  • Processor: 3+ GHz Processor
  • Memory: ８ GB RAM
  • Graphics: OpenGL ES 2.0 hardware driver support required for WebGL acceleration. (AMD Catalyst 10.9, nVidia 358.50)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
